original_text: because we are going to destroy this place. The outcry to the Lord against its people is so great that he has sent us to destroy it.”
korean_text: 그들에 대한 부르짖음이 여호와 앞에 크므로 여호와께서 이 곳을 멸하시려고 우리를 보내셨나니 우리가 멸하리라

sentences.original_text: because we are going to destroy this place
The outcry to the Lord against its people
that he has sent us to destroy it
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 우리를 보내 그것을 멸망시키게 하셨습니다
